body:
Comment 9: 
In discussion with Joe Poirier about this the topic of using an updated version of WiX
came up.  (see issue #7441 https://golang.org/issue/7441)

Is this maybe the right time to consider upgrading our version of WiX, or are we content
to say, as issue #7441 says, that manually uninstalling Go before installing an upgraded
version is the accepted way to do it?
